name: 幼げな声
normalized: …san, yuu-san?
i slowly opened my eyes to the voice i heardfrom the opposite side of my vague consciousness.

name: green-haired girl
normalized: yuu-san?

name: yuu
normalized: nn!?
i woke up like that at once.

name: yuu
normalized: uh…umm?
after blinking several times, i rememberedwhere i was.
it appears that i had dozed off whiletampering with the computer.

name: green-haired girl
normalized: are you awake?

name: yuu
normalized: f, forgive me.
bureau chief fio lahto!
while lowering my head to the little girlpeering in my direction, i wiped my mouth at once.

name: fio
normalized: ahaha, yuu-san, you can call me fio

name: yuu
normalized: sorry.
i'm a little out of it…
after apologizing once more to that little girl,i smiled.
but, the green eyebrows of the little girlstaring at me suddenly furrowed.

name: yuu
normalized: wh, what's wrong?
i got nervous while being unaware of why shehad that somewhat troubled expression on her face.

name: fio
normalized: yuu-san, umm…are you perhaps "done for the day"?

name: yuu
normalized: yes?
…am i done for the day?
i tilted my head to the side in doubt at the meaningof the words that had come out from the little girl'smouth after she too had inclined her head to the side.

name: fio
normalized: yeah, you certainly seem to be done for today,but, umm…do you remember what you're supposeto say?
like that, the boyish little girl againtitled her head to the side in a very exaggeratedmanner this time.

name: yuu
normalized: …perhaps, that i'm tired?
is that what you wanted to hear?

name: fio
normalized: yeah, that!
it seems like it was some secret code.
the little girl's expression cleared up immediately.

name: fio
normalized: but, you're really okay?
you're not tired?
but, instantly again that expression of hersclouded over.

name: yuu
normalized: no, i'm not

name: fio
normalized: y, yeah…?
i nodded while smiling at the still troubledlittle girl.

name: yuu
normalized: i'm sorry.
i worried you, didn't i?

name: fio
normalized: n, no.
i'm just glad that yuu-san is healthy
not achieving much of an understanding,the little girl left me with that expressionstill on her face.

name: yuu
normalized: …hah
while watching that little girl's backas she walked off, i spilled out a small sigh.

name: yuu
normalized: she's too humble to be my superior…
fio lahto s.
sky edge.
that was the name of my boss.
more specifically, she's a space detectivestaying on earth as the bureau chief of theearth space investigation office 389.
in simple words, a space detective.

name: fio
normalized: ahh, please make sure to input thatexotica formula, okay

name: new worker
normalized: r, roger
although she was the youngest inside of thisfacility, it was that very young little girlthat had been entrusted with full authority.
she had all the looks of an earthling,but she was actually from another planet.
the civilizations of humans currently onearth still needed centuries of time andground-breaking technological innovations.
space civilizations had begun spaceinvestigations that prohibited contact withplanets that didn't meet certain standards.
non-interference pacts were formed for planetsthat weren't able to progress into space by themselvesand were put into a safeguard by the original planets.
however, those conditions seemed to have changeda little in the course of a decade.
falling out of the space investigation's observationnet, space civilizations had begun to appear to tryand get in touch with earth in their own ways.
contact itself was an extremely minor thing, butit was possible a great amount of manipulation ofthe civilizations of earth would occur.
however, the space investigation was fullyprepared to take action before any of the uncertainelements and "possibilities" happened.
the space investigation, as a last resort,proposed to set up and man space investigationfacilities in each of earth's governments.
they were to the best of their ability not tointerfere with earth civilizations, but there isknowledge of their existence to some extent.
for that reason, special measures were taken tomake sure the crew acted as earthlings in the facilities that were originally space ships.
this space investigation earth office is oneof them.
well, mostly…
my thoughts broke off as i checked to seewhat time it was on the computer console.

name: yuu
normalized: uh oh, that's not good
it appears that i had been dozing off longerthan i had thought.
it was medicine time.
while checking the time once more,i reached into my jacket pocket in an actioni was well familiar with doing with my hands.
and then, two small pill tablets tumbled aboutin my opened hand.

name: fio
normalized: okay, yuu-san.
a drink if you like
my name had been called immediately after.

name: yuu
normalized: eh?
coincidentally, the savory aroma of coffeebrushed past my nose.
looking, i saw that fio was carrying twosteaming mugs and was holding one of them outto me.

name: yuu
normalized: th, thanks
it seems she had made coffee for the entireearthling crew in the tactical control room thatwas originally the space ship's cockpit.
a calming mood and the good-feeling aromacharacteristic of coffee drifted about theentire tactical control room.

name: fio
normalized: what is that?
restoring my glance to her, fio was lookingcuriously at the pills in the palm of my hand.

name: yuu
normalized: ahh, these are just health supplements,i've been feeling a little dizzy as of late
after showing the pills rolling about in the palmof my hand for a moment, i turned to take the mug.

name: yuu
normalized: thank you for the coffee.
but, the bureau chief needn't go throughthe trouble of making it…

name: fio
normalized: hahaa, so, i wish you would call me fio,even if i'm called things like bureau chief,it's just a title
i guess she was really taking that seriously.
the green-haired little girl before my eyestitled her head slightly to the side in anawkward manner.
this little girl was certainly still a novicespace detective.
although it might be a space investigationorganization that held a dragnet spanning space,it didn't mean they had a lot of personnel.
and, with the exception of earth,there were plenty of places that neededspace investigation protection.
as a result, everyone had been assigned to each of earth's governments but this girl.
and then i, yuu saitou, as an earthling,took the role of a vice bureau chief that helped the estranged new space detectives on this planet.
it was a standard job that involved coveringfor fio and acting as an agent of command whenshe was absent.
i was being given special powers as an earthling.
well, i mostly didn't exercise them, but…
while thinking about such things, i took a sipof the coffee with the pills and experienced the nicearoma and slightly bitter taste filling my mouth.

name: fio
normalized: do you sleep really well when you're tired?
and then, seeing that i had begun to drink thecoffee, fio took a big swig of it herself too.

name: fio
normalized: eww!
she furled her brows immediately after.

name: fio
normalized: bi…bitter…

name: yuu
normalized: r, really?
it appeared to be very bitter.
fio was peering inside of her mug with anexpression like it had not a bit of taste.

name: fio
normalized: uu…i made it with everyone else's, but… yuu-san and them are better at drinking coffee, huh.
umm… i guess you'd call it an "adult taste"?
even so, she took another sip for somereason and grew a slightly stiff smile.

name: yuu
normalized: you don't have to drink it if you don'tlike it bitter…

name: fio
normalized: y, yeah, i guess so, but…
while tearing up a little from the "adult taste"she wasn't yet used to, fio began nodding moreand more.
watching the little girl like that made mesuddenly realize the reason why she was drinkingthe same thing as me.

name: yuu
normalized: are you perhaps worried about me?

name: fio
normalized: eh?
come to think of it, she had asked me ifi slept well when i got tired.

name: yuu
normalized: sorry, i'm worrying you…

name: fio
normalized: n, no way.
i was just, because yuu-san isalways helping me out
though she had said that,she seemed happy to express her true feelings.
fio's smile was less strained than usual.
that sort of personality was also whyfio was regarded quite highly within the bureau.
some time ago i had heard that a new staffmember had been instructed by fio with no lessentiment than towards a superior.

name: fio
normalized: it's thanks to yuu-san that i've been ableto study up on this and that you know
though she was certainly light on experiencecompared to earthlings, fio believing in apositive mindset was no less competent.

name: yuu
normalized: （well, her being so softhearted in this waywas convenient for me too…）
in the moment i was about to take another sip of coffee while thinking about such things…
without any previous notice that it wasgoing to happen, a shrill alert noise begangoing off.
the relaxed mood that was ingratiating thetactical room was suddenly filled with tension.

name: operator
normalized: a high energy response has occurred inblock d-51!
the likelihood of weapons outsideof earth is great!
amidst the continuing alert noise werethe staff members informing us of thesituation with urgent voices.

name: fio
normalized: yuu-san!
and then, together with that little girlwho was smiling gently just a minute ago…

name: fio
normalized: let's go!

name: yuu
normalized: alright
lead by fio who had taken a strong grip ontomy hand, i too had left the tactical control roomin a hurry.
